mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CS_BOARD (BOA_ID, BOA_CONTENT, BOA_CREATE_DATE, BOA_LATITUDE, BOA_LONGITUDE, BOA_PHOTO_ORIGINALFILE, BOA_PHOTO_SAVEFILE, BOA_VIDEO_ORIGINALFILE, BOA_VIDEO_SAVEFILE, MEM_ID) VALUES (CS_BOARD_SEQ.nextval,#{boa_content},sysdate,#{boa_latitude},#{boa_longitude},null,null,null,null,#{mem_id})
